page.title: 07Housing.
page.content: The area has a wide variety of types of housing catering for the different needs of the local population. There are{flats}(not high rise), {bungalows,semi-detatched houses,town {houses,detatched houses and senior {citizen flats and bungalows. The large new housing estate at{West {Bessacarr}has all the types intermixed whilst the older estate at{Cantley tends to be{semi-detatched and town {houses.}Between these two tend to be a mixture of old and new of all varities. All the types of houses are well spread out with gardens at the back and at the front,or landscaped areas.A large percentage of houses have been built within the last few years,the oldest being on average{35 years old.
